localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Just your typical day in the markets...

Dow, S&P, Nasdaq down little over 1%.

$AMC up 300%
$GME up 130%
blogPost.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
只是典型的一天，在市场上...

道指，S&P，纳斯达克指数跌幅超过1%。

$AMC上涨300%
$GME上涨130%

只是典型的一天，在市場上...

道指，S&P，納斯達克指數跌幅超過1%。

$AMC上漲300%
$GME上漲130%
